Shopping Cart Assistant Bracelet: A wearable device that alerts users when they are too far from their shopping cart.
Shopping Cart Assistant Dashboard: A web-based dashboard that provides real-time information on the location and status of shopping carts in a store.
Shopping Cart Assistant RFID Tag: A radio-frequency identification tag that can be attached to shopping carts to help track their location and movement.
Shopping Cart Assistant Robot: A robot that can navigate stores and help users locate their shopping carts.
Shopping Cart Assistant AR App: An augmented reality app that can display information about the location and status of shopping carts in a store.
